content: this crochet dishcloth is ridiculously fun to make the 3d flowers are worked as you go with nothing to make separately and attach later the blossoms are so sweet and will also give you a little extra scrubbing power only basic crochet stitches are used you just need to rotate your work a few times and crochet into the posts of stitches from previous row **yarn** pattern is written for either worsted or fingering weight cotton for the worsted version you ll need about 150 yds for the fingering about 225 yds we used coastal cotton worsted and fine for our samples **hooks & notions** us size g 4mm for worsted version us size d 3 25mm for fingering tapestry needle **gauge** worsted 20 single_crochet and 20 row = 4 fingering 23 single_crochet and 22 row = 4 gauge is not particularly important for this project **finished size** approximately 9 x 9 both versions use the code 10bloomingblossoms in the checkout at www stixyarn com 1 for 10% off the purchase of coastal cotton or coastal cotton fine 1 https //stixyarn com/
